title: Amauropelta correllii
text: Amauropelta correllii, <a href="Synonym%20%28taxonomy%29">synonym</a> Thelypteris correllii, is a species of <a href="fern">fern</a> in the family <a href="Thelypteridaceae">Thelypteridaceae</a>. It is <a href="Endemism">endemic</a> to <a href="Ecuador">Ecuador</a>. Its natural <a href="habitat">habitat</a> is subtropical or tropical moist <a href="montane%20forest">montane forest</a>s. It is threatened by <a href="habitat%20loss">habitat loss</a>.
